title: Garden Vegetable Quinoa Soup
short_description: A nutritions veggie quinoa soup, brimming with taste and health benefits that's ready under 30 minutes.
ingredients: 100g green beans, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces

steps.title: Prepare Ingredients
steps.description: Dice the onions and slice the carrots and celery. Wash the quinoa thoroughly and mince the garlic.

steps.title: Sauté Vegetables
steps.description: Heat olive oil over medium heat in a large pot and sauté onions, carrots, and celery for about 5 minutes until softened. Add the minced garlic and sauté for an additional minute.

steps.title: Mix in Quinoa and Tomatoes
steps.description: Stir in the quinoa, canned tomatoes, vegetable stock, bay leaf, dried thyme, and basil. Bring the mixture to a simmer.

steps.title: Cook the Soup
steps.description: Reduce heat to medium-low and cover the pot. Let it simmer for about 15 minutes.

steps.title: Add Remaining Vegetables
steps.description: Stir in the zucchini and green beans, and continue to simmer for another 5 minutes uncovered or until the quinoa is cooked and the vegetables are tender.

steps.title: Season and Garnish
steps.description: Remove the bay leaf, and season the soup with salt and pepper. Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
